data.meta_site_name: THERESA WIEDEMANN Obituary | October 3, 2021 | Riverside Memorial Chapels Inc - Ewing Township, NJ
data.text:
THERESA WIEDEMANN 84

THERESA WIEDEMANN 84 OF TRENTON NJ PASSED INTO GODS LOVING EMBRACE ON SUNDAY OCT 3RD AT CAPTIAL HEALTH IN TRENTON BORN IN LAWRENCEVILLE MRS,WIEDEMANN RESIDED IN MORRISVILLE BEFORE SETTLING IN TO TRENTON DAUGHTER OF THE LATE MICHAEL AND ELIZABETH TANZILLO

AND WIFE OF THE LATE CHARLES WIEDEMANN

THERESA WAS BEAUTIFUL SOUL SHE WAS AN AVID YANKEE AND HORROR FAN ENJOYED COOKING,DANCING CRAFTING READING AND JOKING AROUND.SHE WAS LOVED BY MANY AND BE GREATLY MISSED THERESA IS SURVIVED BY HER CHILDREN ANNA MARIE BARTOK HUSBAND ED SALLANDER,LINDA AND HUSBAND RICH ERICKSEN AND GAIL AND HUSBAND STEVE GRAINGER

GRANDDAUGHTERS THERESA BARTOK AND HEATHER FOOTE TWO GREAT GRANDCHILDERN JACK AND HENRY AND MANY NIECES,NEPHEWS FAMILY AND FRIENDS

CREMATION WILL BE PRIVATE SERVICES WILL BE HELD ON SAT OCT 16 AT 10 AM AT ST GREGORY THE GREAT CHURCH 4620 NOTTINGHAM WAY HAMILTON NJ 08690

FLOWERS MAY BE SENT TO THE CHURCH OR PRIMARY RESIDENCE.
